popularityCurve.label: the form of danny buderus and michael crocker warrants their selection in this squad and if they continue on that form they'll warrant selection in regards to the world cup

clusterList.phrase: the form of danny buderus and michael crocker warrants their selection in this squad and if they continue on that form they'll warrant selection in regards to the world cup
i believe they have been working pretty hard in the morning and also during games so it's good for them to have a rest so they can prepare for their last game
